channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: European Defense Stocks Face Volatility Amid Unclear U.S. Foreign Policy
item.description: European defense stocks should brace for price volatility in the coming months until Europe gets a clearer idea of Donald Trump’s foreign policy, Citi...

item.title: Gold Prices Remain Favorable in Short-To-Medium Term
item.description: Spot gold was higher and XS.com said the precious metal remains favorable in the short-to-medium term, especially if low-interest-rate conditions pers...

item.title: Super Micro shares plummet 18% after financial update heightens investor concerns
item.description: Super Micro's stock fell to its lowest since mid-2023 on Wednesday after the company issued unaudited quarterly results that added to investor concern...

item.title: E.l.f. shares soar as cosmetics retailer raises guidance after posting 40% sales gain
item.description: E.l.f. Beauty raised its full year guidance after posting a 40% jump in sales.

item.title: German Bunds Shrug Off Government's Collapse
item.description: Bund yields rose early in the European session, as traders shrugged off the collapse of Germany’s coalition government due to disagreements over econo...

item.title: CVS posts mixed results, holds off on guidance in Joyner's first earnings report as CEO
item.description: CVS expects elevated medical costs to continue to pressure its performance this year, "and as a result we are not providing a formal outlook at this t...

item.title: Bitcoin Eases From Record High After U.S. Election
item.description: Bitcoin eased back from its record high but Zaye Capital Markets said Trump’s potentially inflationary policies, the Fed’s rate cut cycle and increasi...

item.title: Adyen shares slide as payments giant's transaction volume growth slows
item.description: Adyen shares sank Thursday after the company reported a slowdown in the growth of its transaction volumes in the third quarter.

item.title: British fintech firm Wise posts 55% jump in profit on expanding market share
item.description: British digital payments firm Wise said that its first-half profit totalled £217.3 million ($279.8 million) in the first-half period, up 55% year-over...

item.title: Trump Tax Cuts Come at the Right Time for Stocks. Further Ahead, It Gets Murky.
item.description: Lower taxes would be a boon for an equity market that was starting to look priced for perfection, but tariffs could create longer-term damage.
